promptText:
VERBAVID: Transforming reports into engaging videos.
Automates video creation from text input.
Solves the problem of boring text content.
People prefer videos over lengthy text.
Saves time and eliminates video editing skills.
Leverages AI for voice narration and visuals.
Offers user-friendly interface and customization.
Enhances audience engagement significantly.
Facilitates easy video sharing and distribution.
Supports various video formats and resolutions.
Integrates with popular social media platforms.
Provides analytics and user feedback.
AI-powered text summarization for key points.
Customizable video templates and themes.
Handles image and video asset integration.
Natural-sounding AI-generated voiceovers.
Target audience: content creators, educators, businesses.
Improves content accessibility and understanding.
Reduces the need for expensive software.
Project uses JavaScript, ReactJS, and MongoDB.
Detailed hardware and software requirements listed.
Project schedule plan with Gantt chart included.
Team includes instructor, mentor, and two students.
Student contributions clearly defined for each member.
Revolutionizes text-to-video content creation.
Bridges the gap between text and visual storytelling.
Efficient and user-friendly video creation.
A smarter, faster, and more customizable solution.
